484871:
It catches up with me-
Soften the blow
Already spread thin
I promise I'm fine
because time never passes for me there in the dark
A shadow of your former self there in the light
And oh, the one thing you are good at is wasting your love
In a cold bed you can say you were never there
The one thing that turns you in your grave
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

our locked eyes and your shy glance away
the way your hand fits in mine
clutching your ring
the cold side of the bed
your perfume on my sheets
don't let these days stretch into weeks
a missed call
your missed voice
a missed chance at real happiness
candle light
a bottle of wine
my days are long
and my nights i don't remember
it's my fault
i fell in love in the first place
if you leave this city
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

two paths crossing at just the right time
I stopped birthing plans a long time ago
I'm only concerned with where the clock's hands lay
and for now I'll be anything you need

oh Michelle, I just don't know exactly what I am doing
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

I'm begging you to not let me walk away
I'm begging you to not break this heart again
a white sheet descends over our bodies over our bodies
and I smooth it out and watch from a distance again
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

I can't believe it is almost five years
and so much has changed since you've been gone
there are a million things I wish I could tell you
like I've met a girl whose eyes draw me in
to a world where my heart beats faster
and if only I could convince her of everything
and Grayson is doing just fine
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

two choices out before me
I know it seems like you are stepping out into the dark

but can't you see?
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

say goodbye say goodbye
don't waste time
say goodbye don't waste time don't waste time
just run
save yourself
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

holding myself down beneath the snow
dying in cold down beneath the snow
laying in white and oppressed by white

I wave goodbye

trying to find what is left of me
tapping your boots right above my head

just leave

...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

when the daylight seeps in through the blinds
I find you are never there
pack up all the night's dreams
only to drag them out again

in my favorite one there is a house we joked about
wooden floors and chandeliers
you once said you remembered
why is it so hard to stay away

so don't
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

and when you are settled
will you still be there
I want you to be there
with the same eyes
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

if I could stretch out these moments
I would make them last a lifetime
your laugh and my sighs

I know I know

our hearts beating in time
don't let it fall through our hands
close your hand over mine

I know I know
